itemDisplayName: Create Azure Cosmos DB Acc with Consistency
description: This template will create an Azure Cosmos DB Account with the name provided, the location set to the same location as the resource group that was used, and the Offer Type set to Standard. This template also includes the optional consistencyPolicy property. Using this property you can control the Default Consistency Level for the new Database Account.
summary: Create an Azure Cosmos DB Database Account with a specified Consistency Policy
